reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Supporting the modernisation of China's anti-money laundering framework to meet with global standards in combating money laundering

description.narrative: This project is designed to support China in aligning its legislation and practice with global standards - set by the Financial Action Task Force (FATF) - laying the groundwork for the Rule of Law pillar of the China programme. China is due to undergo its next FATF evaluation in 2018-19. The project will add value through a baseline study for FATF evaluation, raise awareness of FATF requirements among business and government, and develop recommendations for meeting these requirements. A stronger anti-money laundering infrastructure will enhance sustainable and inclusive economic growth, ensure a more level playing field for international, including UK, business and reduce risk for international investment.
